column4: hi, how can i manualy start cups, becouse i delete file in /etc/init.d/ and now my printer don't work ?
i try twice but there is no file
if you dont care for settings, apt-get remove --purge cupsys, apt-get install cupsys
did you 'purge' it.. that means clean all configuration, not just binaries
ther is no file cup*, and yes i purge it
yes after install cupsys, dpkg also don't help
well i can send you my version, 8.10 ubuntu, didnt change :)
http://www.wolfey.si/tmp/cups  (and rest check it so i aint spywaring him :)
thanks i will restart pc now
i forget chmod, it is restarted cups now
